love.description: Romantic connections - from first sparks to long-term commitment

friend.description: Platonic bonds - the people you choose as your tribe

family.description: Blood or chosen family - the ties that shaped you

crush.llm_guidance: This is early attraction territory. Focus on chemistry signals and how to read if they're into it. Keep advice grounded - no mind games, just real talk about what the stars say about their vibe together.

dating.llm_guidance: They're actively exploring this connection. Highlight compatibility green flags and watch-outs. Help them understand the pacing - when to lean in, when to pump the brakes.

situationship.llm_guidance: The undefined zone. Address the ambiguity head-on - what might each person actually want here? When's the right time to have the talk? No judgment, just clarity.

partner.llm_guidance: Committed but not married. Focus on deepening the connection, keeping things interesting, and growing together. Where are the friction points? Where's the magic?

boyfriend.llm_guidance: Committed relationship with a guy. Focus on understanding his communication style, emotional needs, and how they can build something real together.

girlfriend.llm_guidance: Committed relationship with a girl. Focus on understanding her emotional landscape, what she needs to feel secure, and how they bring out the best in each other.

spouse.llm_guidance: Long-term commitment. This is about navigating life together - the boring stuff, the hard stuff, keeping the spark alive through it all. Focus on shared purpose and staying connected.

ex.llm_guidance: Past romantic connection. Help them understand what went wrong, what lessons to carry forward, and whether reconnection makes sense or if it's time to fully close this chapter.

friend.llm_guidance: Regular friendship. Focus on what makes them click, how they support each other, and where misunderstandings might happen. Keep it light but real.

close_friend.llm_guidance: Inner circle but maybe not the bestie. Focus on what strengthens this bond and how to deepen it if that's what they want.

new_friend.llm_guidance: Fresh connection. Focus on compatibility potential, shared interests, and whether this friendship has legs for the long haul.

mother.llm_guidance: The mother relationship. Focus on approval patterns, boundaries, healing old wounds, and finding adult-to-adult footing. This is deep stuff.

father.llm_guidance: The father relationship. Focus on expectations, communication gaps, and building connection as adults. Address any distant or complicated dynamics honestly.

sister.llm_guidance: Sister bond. Focus on shared history, rivalry patterns, and how to be allies now. Sisters can be best friends or complicated - meet them where they are.

brother.llm_guidance: Brother bond. Focus on understanding different communication styles, competitive dynamics, and building adult friendship out of sibling history.

daughter.llm_guidance: Parent to daughter. Focus on nurturing her growth, understanding her needs at this stage, and maintaining connection as she becomes her own person.

son.llm_guidance: Parent to son. Focus on communication approaches, supporting his development, and building trust as he grows more independent.

grandparent.llm_guidance: Grandparent connection. Focus on wisdom exchange, bridging generational gaps, and appreciating this relationship while they can.

extended.llm_guidance: Aunts, uncles, cousins, in-laws. Focus on navigating family politics, setting boundaries, and finding genuine connection within the obligatory.

manager.llm_guidance: Direct supervisor relationship. Focus on feedback patterns, getting support for growth, and maintaining professional boundaries while building rapport.

colleague.llm_guidance: Work peer. Focus on collaboration style, avoiding office friction, and whether this could become a genuine friendship or should stay professional.

mentor.llm_guidance: Someone guiding their growth. Focus on how to absorb their wisdom, ask the right questions, and show appreciation without being a suck-up.

mentee.llm_guidance: Someone they're guiding. Focus on teaching style, patience patterns, and how to empower without creating dependency.

client.llm_guidance: Professional service relationship. Focus on understanding their needs, communication preferences, and maintaining boundaries while delivering value.

business_partner.llm_guidance: Shared stakes relationship. Focus on complementary strengths, decision-making styles, and navigating disagreements without blowing up the partnership.

acquaintance.llm_guidance: Surface-level connection. Focus on whether to invest more here or keep it casual. What's the potential if they went deeper?

neighbor.llm_guidance: Proximity-based relationship. Focus on maintaining peace, setting boundaries, and maybe finding unexpected friendship.

ex_friend.llm_guidance: Friendship that ended. Help them understand what happened, whether reconciliation makes sense, and how to process any lingering feelings.

complicated.llm_guidance: Can't be boxed in. Focus on understanding the unique dynamics at play and finding clarity in the confusion.
